name: Win Big Or Die
description: Win Big or Die! is a third-person shooter that takes place on the distant planet of Swaria. You were born into slavery and the only way to escape is to fight in a game show. You must survive to win fame, fortune and your freedom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Very imaginative game, and adds a nice twist to the shooter genre. The controls are intuitive (for most people), and the novelty aspect of the game will increase replayability.  See gameplay:         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  Win Big Or Die - Free PC Steam Game
